neighborhoods.name: Great Square (Velké náměstí)
neighborhoods.character: The historic heart of Hradec Kralove, featuring beautiful Renaissance and Baroque architecture with a vibrant market atmosphere.

location.description: Located in the center of the old town, surrounded by historic buildings and the main market area.

history.overview: The historic center of Hradec Kralove, dating back to medieval times when it served as the main market square.
history.significance: Home to the city's most important historic buildings and the traditional center of civic life.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant activity and good lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for market activity, evening for dining and atmosphere.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with pedestrian-friendly streets and squares.

attractions.name: White Tower
attractions.description: The iconic 72-meter high tower offering panoramic views of the city.
attractions.appeal: Climb the 233 steps for the best views of Hradec Kralove.

attractions.name: Holy Spirit Cathedral
attractions.description: Magnificent 14th-century cathedral with stunning architecture and religious significance.
attractions.appeal: Experience the spiritual heart of the city with beautiful stained glass.

attractions.name: Great Square Market
attractions.description: Traditional market offering fresh produce, local specialties, and crafts.
attractions.appeal: Experience authentic Czech market culture and local life.

dining.name: Restaurant U Labutě
dining.known_for: Fine dining with traditional Czech influences

activities.name: Historic Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the historic architecture and learn about the city's rich history.

activities.name: Market Shopping
activities.description: Browse fresh produce, local crafts, and traditional Czech goods.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the heart of historic Hradec Kralove
You enjoy traditional Czech culture and architecture
insider_tips: Visit the market early morning for the freshest produce and fewest crowds.
Climb the White Tower at sunset for the most beautiful views.

neighborhoods.name: University District
neighborhoods.character: A vibrant area centered around the University of Hradec Kralove, known for its youthful energy and cultural activities.

location.description: Located near the city center, surrounding the main university campus and student facilities.

history.overview: Developed around the university's establishment, becoming a hub for education and student life.
history.significance: Center of academic life and cultural innovation in the city.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with a large student population and good lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Academic year for vibrant student atmosphere.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with pedestrian-friendly campus and surrounding areas.

attractions.name: University Campus
attractions.description: Modern university facilities with beautiful architecture and green spaces.
attractions.appeal: Experience the academic atmosphere and student life.

attractions.name: Student Cultural Center
attractions.description: Hosts student performances, exhibitions, and cultural events.
attractions.appeal: Discover emerging artists and student creativity.

attractions.name: University Library
attractions.description: Modern library with extensive collections and study spaces.
attractions.appeal: Peaceful environment for study or reading.

activities.name: Student Cultural Events
activities.description: Attend student performances, exhibitions, and cultural festivals.

activities.name: Campus Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the university campus and its modern architecture.

stay_here_if: You are a student or young traveler
You want budget-friendly accommodation and dining
insider_tips: Check the university calendar for free cultural events and performances.
Visit during the academic year for the most vibrant atmosphere.

neighborhoods.name: Jirásek Gardens Area
neighborhoods.character: A peaceful residential area centered around the beautiful Jirásek Gardens, offering a green oasis in the city.

location.description: Located near the city center, surrounding the expansive Jirásek Gardens and residential neighborhoods.

history.overview: Developed as a residential area with the gardens named after Czech writer Alois Jirásek.
history.significance: Provides green space and recreation for the city's residents.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with a family-friendly residential atmosphere.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Spring and summer for garden beauty, autumn for colorful foliage.
practical_info.walkability: Very good with pedestrian paths and garden trails.

attractions.name: Jirásek Gardens
attractions.description: Beautiful gardens with walking paths, flower beds, and peaceful atmosphere.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for relaxation, picnics, and enjoying nature in the city.

attractions.name: Local Parks
attractions.description: Additional smaller parks and green areas throughout the neighborhood.
attractions.appeal: Multiple options for outdoor recreation and relaxation.

attractions.name: Residential Architecture
attractions.description: Charming residential buildings with garden access and family-friendly design.
attractions.appeal: Experience local residential life and architecture.

activities.name: Garden Walking
activities.description: Explore the beautiful gardens and walking paths.

activities.name: Picnic in the Gardens
activities.description: Enjoy a peaceful picnic surrounded by beautiful flowers and greenery.

stay_here_if: You want a peaceful, family-friendly environment
You enjoy green spaces and nature
avoid_if: You seek vibrant nightlife and entertainment
You prefer to be in the heart of the action
insider_tips: Visit the gardens early morning for the most peaceful experience.
Bring a picnic to enjoy the beautiful surroundings.

neighborhoods.name: Cultural District
neighborhoods.character: A cultural hub featuring museums, galleries, and performance venues, showcasing the city's artistic heritage.

location.description: Located near the city center, surrounding cultural institutions and historic buildings.

history.overview: Developed around the city's major cultural institutions and historic performance venues.
history.significance: Center of artistic and cultural life in Hradec Kralove.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with good lighting and cultural activity.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Year-round for indoor attractions, check performance schedules.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with cultural venues within easy walking distance.

attractions.name: East Bohemian Museum
attractions.description: Comprehensive museum showcasing the history and culture of East Bohemia.
attractions.appeal: Learn about the region's rich heritage and archaeological finds.

attractions.name: Galerie moderního umění
attractions.description: Gallery of Modern Art featuring contemporary Czech and international artwork.
attractions.appeal: Discover contemporary art and rotating exhibitions.

attractions.name: Klicper Theatre
attractions.description: Historic theater hosting performances of drama, opera, and ballet.
attractions.appeal: Experience live performances in a beautiful historic venue.

dining.name: Restaurant Na Hradě
dining.known_for: Sophisticated Czech cuisine with city views

dining.name: Café Restaurant Adalbertinum
dining.known_for: Historic café atmosphere and cultural connection

activities.name: Museum Hopping
activities.description: Visit multiple museums and galleries in one day.

activities.name: Attend a Performance
activities.description: Enjoy a theater performance, concert, or cultural event.

stay_here_if: You love art, culture, and history
You want to be near major cultural attractions
avoid_if: You prefer outdoor activities and nature
insider_tips: Check museum websites for free admission days and special exhibitions.
Book theater tickets in advance for popular performances.

neighborhoods.name: Residential Quarter
neighborhoods.character: A quiet residential area where locals live, offering authentic Czech neighborhood life away from tourist crowds.

location.description: Located in the outer areas of the city, featuring typical Czech residential architecture and local amenities.

history.overview: Developed as a residential area for local families and workers.
history.significance: Represents authentic Czech residential life and community.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with a strong community atmosphere.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Weekends for local markets and community events.
practical_info.walkability: Good with local shops and services within walking distance.

attractions.name: Local Markets
attractions.description: Small local markets offering fresh produce and household goods.
attractions.appeal: Experience authentic Czech community life and local shopping.

attractions.name: Community Centers
attractions.description: Centers hosting local events, classes, and community activities.
attractions.appeal: Connect with local residents and community life.

attractions.name: Local Parks
attractions.description: Small neighborhood parks and playgrounds for families.
attractions.appeal: Peaceful spots for relaxation and family activities.

dining.name: Local Pub
dining.known_for: Authentic local pub atmosphere and Czech beer

activities.name: Local Market Visit
activities.description: Visit local markets to see authentic Czech community life.

activities.name: Community Event Participation
activities.description: Attend local events and festivals to experience community life.

stay_here_if: You want to experience authentic local Czech life
avoid_if: You want to be near major tourist attractions
You seek vibrant nightlife and entertainment
insider_tips: Visit local markets early morning to see residents shopping for daily needs.
Attend community events to experience authentic Czech culture.
